mapper.insert: insert into project_reply(proj_reply_no, proj_id, proj_reply_cont, proj_reply_date, member_no) values (seq_project_reply.nextval, #{proj_id}, #{proj_reply_cont}, TO_DATE(#{proj_reply_date},'yyyy-MM-dd'), #{member_no} )
mapper.update: update project_reply set proj_reply_cont = #{proj_reply_cont}, proj_reply_update = sysdate where proj_reply_no = #{proj_reply_no}
mapper.select: select * from project_reply where proj_id = #{proj_id} order by proj_reply_date desc
